DERBY-1005 getHoldability does not return CLOSE_CURSORS_AT_COMMIT in a global transaction
* Adds a line to resetConnection method in org/apache/derby/client/am/Connection.java which was missed in the merge of DERBY-1005. This was causing a failure in the tests added for DERBY-1144.
